title: Can I add browsing as a hobby in my resume? - Quora

response.answer_text: As in browsing the internet? You can add that to your resume, but you really shouldn’t. Here’s a rule of thumb: don’t add things that require no particular skill or effort—or, for that matter, things that almost anyone can do. In fact, you probably shouldn’t be adding hobbies at all unless there’s a particular reason why your future employer would be interested in them.
